message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Constructive, risk-on close in mid/small caps. Fresh/ongoing momentum in GMRAIRPORT (>105.5 follow-through), LTF (post-302 breakout), ABCAPITAL (near highs), and LAURUSLABS (break above 1,025). PSU rail/infrastructure stayed firm (RVNL coiling just below breakout), capital goods steady (BHEL holding above 287–292 band). Exchanges/depositories mixed but stable (BSE above 2860; CDSL holding >1600). Plan: stage 3–5 small positions Monday on strength; use tight, strength-only emergency buys tomorrow if triggers fire.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "GMRAIRPORT", "signal": "Breakout continuation buy", "reason": "Follow-through above 105.5 with strong close; add on strength through today’s high for 111/115 potential; invalidation below ~103.8.", "price": 108.35},
    {"symbol": "LTF", "signal": "Breakout continuation buy", "reason": "Tight base resolved >302; sustained strength while >297; look for push above 315 for next leg.", "price": 312.35},
    {"symbol": "RVNL", "signal": "Breakout buy on strength", "reason": "Coiling just under key 329.9–330; strong trend resumes on decisive breakout; use ~311 as risk.", "price": 324.1},
    {"symbol": "ABCAPITAL", "signal": "Continuation buy", "reason": "Closed near highs; push through 360–361 can extend; manage risk under ~346.", "price": 358.05},
    {"symbol": "LAURUSLABS", "signal": "Fresh breakout buy", "reason": "Cleared 1005/1025 supply; momentum intact above 1004 with room toward 1065/1090.", "price": 1031.35},
    {"symbol": "BHEL", "signal": "Buy pullbacks / trend support", "reason": "Holding above 287–292 breakout band; buy dips to 286–288 or strength >292; risk 281.5/276.", "price": 290.85},
    {"symbol": "NBCC", "signal": "Retest-buy setup", "reason": "Retesting 117.5 breakout; buy dips ~114–115 or strength >118.9 with tight stop ~111.5.", "price": 116.69},
    {"symbol": "IDBI", "signal": "Accumulate on dip; momentum only >105", "reason": "Base 98–105 intact; accumulate near 99–101 with stop ~96 or wait for breakout >105.", "price": 100.38},
    {"symbol": "HINDCOPPER", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Testing 330 resistance; sustain >331 opens 335–340; risk ~312.", "price": 327.0},
    {"symbol": "INDUSTOWER", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Coiling; sustained move >415 with volume can start next leg; risk ~392.", "price": 401.05},
    {"symbol": "CDSL", "signal": "Reclaim buy on strength", "reason": "Stable >1600; momentum builds on reclaim >1665–1670; cut if <1575.", "price": 1617.2},
    {"symbol": "BSE", "signal": "Reclaim/pullback buy", "reason": "Back above 2860/2879; buy pullbacks toward that zone with risk below ~2795–2800.", "price": 2902.4}
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [
    {"symbol": "GMRAIRPORT", "action": "Buy", "reason": "Don’t miss continuation if it breaks today’s high with volume.", "quantity": 30, "price": "Buy-Stop 109.20, SL 103.80"},
    {"symbol": "LTF", "action": "Buy", "reason": "Fresh leg likely if it powers through recent high; tight risk.", "quantity": 20, "price": "Buy-Stop 315.60, SL 297.00"},
    {"symbol": "RVNL", "action": "Buy", "reason": "Breakout trigger above 330 resumes trend; defined risk.", "quantity": 20, "price": "Buy-Stop 330.00, SL 311.00"},
    {"symbol": "ABCAPITAL", "action": "Buy", "reason": "Continuation through 360–361; strong relative strength.", "quantity": 10, "price": "Buy-Stop 360.50, SL 346.00"},
    {"symbol": "NBCC", "action": "Buy", "reason": "Retest-buy near support with favorable R:R.", "quantity": 40, "price": "Limit 115.00, SL 111.50"}
  ],
  "portfolio": {"cash": 27184.3, "total_value": 27184.3, "holdings_count": 0, "holdings": []},
  "screening_notes": [
    "PSU rail/infrastructure: RVNL strong close near highs; clean trigger >330. IRCON steady 160–162; confirmation >165. GRSE volatile but trend intact.",
    "Exchanges/Depositories: BSE firm above 2860/2879; CDSL holding >1600, momentum only on >1665–1670. MCX corrected sharply; avoid chasing.",
    "Airports: GMRAIRPORT sustained breakout; add only on strength or pullbacks >105.5 holding.",
    "Capital goods/cables: BHEL constructive above 287–292; BEL needs >418 then >432 for momentum. KEI/Polycab firm but extended—small size only on strength.",
    "Metals: HINDCOPPER flirting with 330; SAIL still sub-145 resistance—avoid until breakout.",
    "Banks/NBFC: LTF leading post-breakout; PSU banks (IDBI/IOB/CENTRALBK) in bases—prefer dip-buys or breakout triggers.",
    "Power/Renewables: NTPCGREEN range-bound 94–95.5; InoxWind choppy; Waaree Ener cooled off—strength-only entries.",
    "Pharma: LAURUSLABS breakout; LUPIN firm >2070; Biocon needs >405 to improve.",
    "IT/Services: KPITTECH/MPHASIS constructive; COFORGE steady—use strength-only entries given volatility.",
    "Discretionary/FMCG: Trent firm; VBL strong; JUBLFOOD needs >608–612 for momentum; Voltas stable.",
    "Execution: Prefer Monday entries after first 20–30 min range. If tomorrow gaps >0.7%, let range form and buy pullbacks into marked levels with predefined stops; keep sizes small given 27k capital."
  ]
}
